definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: The frequency distribution of characteristic value of the male cones and pollen is abnomal.
sentences.chinese: 杉木雄球花及花粉特征值频率分布为偏态分布。

sentences.english: Skewness is a statistical measure of the uniformity of the distribution of a group of measures.
sentences.chinese: 偏态是对一组分布均匀性测量的统计度量。

sentences.english: The simulation uses a skewed lag-one autoregressive model.
sentences.chinese: 模拟中选用了偏态的一阶自回归模型。

sentences.english: It is practically proved that frequency distribution of drill-core recovery is partial.
sentences.chinese: 实践证明，岩心钻探取心率的频率分布是偏态的。

definition: large-sized (of clothes, shoes)/(old) to give an order/(old) to quit one's job in a store
repeated code/coincident code (i.e. two characters or words having the same encoding)
consecutive serial numbers/chain (of supermarkets, hotels etc)/hyphen
the units place (or column) in the decimal system
remainder (after rounding a number)/decimal part (of number after the decimal point)/mantissa (i.e. fractional part of common logarithm in math.)/small change/balance (of an account)
to throw one's energies (into an activity)/to invest one's emotions (in sth)/to bet/betting
